dcterms:description: A dataset used to model a Moving Target Defense (MTD) for web applications, considering the performance impact of movement between configurations and the adversary's actions based on mined CVEs from the National Vulnerability Database.
dcterms:title: MTD for web-applications

dcterms:creator: Sailik Sengupta
Ankur Chowdhary
Dijiang Huang
Subbarao Kambhampati
dcterms:description: A dataset used to model a Moving Target Defense (MTD) for cloud networks, focusing on the strategic placement of Intrusion Detection Systems (IDSs) to minimize performance impact while maximizing security.
dcterms:title: MTD for cloud networks

dcterms:creator: Oleg Sheyner
Joshua Haines
Somesh Jha
Richard Lippmann
Jeannette M Wing
dcterms:description: A dataset representing attack graphs, which capture possible attack paths through a network, used to model the states and actions in a Bayesian Stackelberg Markov Game.
dcterms:title: Attack graphs

dcterms:description: A comprehensive database of vulnerabilities, providing information on known vulnerabilities in software and hardware, referenced for adversary actions in the context of Moving Target Defense.
dcterms:title: National Vulnerability Database (NVD)
